question: Should inspectors issue a “Receipt for samples taken” form when taking samples at retail for the Health Canada?
answer: No, must pay for samples collected for OGDs as directed by a sampling plan. When payment is made for a sample, no "Receipt for samples taken" form is issued.
title: https://inspection.canada.ca/inspection-and-enforcement/guidance-for-food-inspection-activities/sample-collection/food-sample-collection/eng/1540234969218/1540235089869#a7_17
